member.name: M:BenchmarkDotNet.Diagnostics.Windows.Configs.InliningDiagnoserAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: only the methods that failed to get inlined. True by default.
only the methods from declaring type's namespace. Set to false if you want to see all Jit inlining events. True by default.

member.name: M:BenchmarkDotNet.Diagnostics.Windows.EtwDiagnoser`1.WaitForDelayedEvents
member.summary: ETW real-time sessions receive events with a slight delay. Typically it shouldn't be more than a few seconds. This increases the likelihood that all relevant events are processed by the collection thread by the time we are done with the benchmark.

member.name: M:BenchmarkDotNet.Diagnostics.Windows.InliningDiagnoser.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: only the methods that failed to get inlined. True by default.
only the methods from declaring type's namespace. Set to false if you want to see all Jit inlining events. True by default.
